recipe.title: Alive and Kicking
ingredients: 3/4 ounce Compass Box Whisky Co. Orangerie or Grand Marnier
instructions: Combine 1 ounce strong coldbrew coffee, 1 ounce Fernet, 3/4 ounce amaro (preferably Barolo Chinato), 3/4 ounce Compass Box Whisky Co. Orangerie or Grand Marnier, and 1/4 ounce demerara simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and shake vigorously until outside is frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
